Bases: object

add_concepts(tsv_path)¶

Add concept and relationships in TSV format. This is adpator for persisted concept models :param tsv_path: :return:

contains_vertex(vertex_name)¶
get_neighborhood(w1)¶
get_path(w1, w2)¶

Path from w1 to w2. If no path exist then will return empty list. The starting point of the path (w1) is not included in the returned path The end point (w2)) is included in the path :param w1: :param w2: :return:

get_path_for_all(w1, w2_list, cutoff=5)¶

Return the simple path from w1 to all concepts in w2. All possible paths will be returned :param w1: source term :param w2_list: target terms in list :param cutoff: the maximal path length :return:
